description:
# [Meta Toy City: Meta Toy Material Item] is a collection of Meta Toy City. 
 
 Meta Toy City is a mobile multiplayer role-playing game that offers players Free-to-Play, Guild-fi, Play-and-Earn experience. 
 Enter a world where ToyZ have gone wild. Join the guild to start your hack-and-slash adventure! 
 
 # Equipment Collection & Buff 
 ★0 Mega Water Balloon Treasure - Attack +10 
 ★0 Mega Water Balloon Loot - Attack +5 
 
 *This MATERIAL ITEM can be collected in-game to obtain the following permanent buff
name: Unrevealed MTMI
